name: Microwave 4-minute BBQ Chicken Nachos Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: rotisserie chicken, BBQ sauce, tortilla chips, pico de gallo, shredded cheddar cheese, green onion, guacamole, sour cream
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix the chicken with the barbecue sauce, then spread evenly over a bed of tortilla chips.
Spread the pico de gallo, cheese, and green onions evenly on top, then microwave for about 1-2 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Dollop with some guacamole and sour cream, then serve.
